description: This is a play on tsimmes, a traditional Jewish casserole The flavors of North Africa and the Middle East are utilized for this lamb shoulder Braising the meat in red wine yields a tender cut of meat without a lot of work.
title: Passover-Inspired Braised Lamb With Dried Fruit
title_page: Passover-Inspired Braised Lamb With Dried Fruit Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This is a play on tsimmes, a traditional Jewish casserole. The flavors of North Africa and the Middle East are utilized for this lamb shoulder. Braising the meat in red wine yields a tender cut of meat without a lot of work.
Featured in: Feast In The South.
